reviewText: Winning start in the mind. We must see ourselves as winners. Practice in our minds over and over. Our minds don't know the real from the unreal. We can see things in our minds and practice over and over in our minds and we will improve. What we think about most is what we will become. I have enjoyed this DVD, watch it at least three times, plan on watching it more. Every time I watch it, I pick up more new things I have missed.  Thank You, A.D. Bates
